snippet: Delegates agreed Wednesday to a new draft constitution for Somalia that is meant to help the violence-torn East African country return to stability.
abstract: Delegates, undeterred by a suicide bombing outside the conference they were attending, agree to a new draft constitution for Somalia that is meant to help the violence-torn East African nation return to stability.
lead_paragraph: Delegates agreed Wednesday to a new draft constitution for Somalia that is meant to help the violence-torn East African country return to stability.
